remarks: A variable introduction law for class equality, using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-2003.)
statement:
eqvincf.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
eqvincf.2 $e |- F/_ x B $.
eqvincf.3 $e |- A e. _V $.
eqvincf $p |- ( A = B <-> E. x ( x = A /\ x = B ) ) $.
